TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlProcedureAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlProcedureAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlProcedureAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用於將組件中的方法定義標記為預存程序 (Stored Procedure)。

span.span: Used to mark a method definition in an assembly as a stored procedure.

summary.span: 該屬性 (Attribute) 上的屬性 (Property) 反映使用 SQL Server 註冊型別時使用的實體特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅供 Microsoft Visual Studio 會自動註冊為預存程序的 指定的方法。 is used only by Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically register the specified method as a stored procedure. 它不使用 SQL Server。It is not used by SQL Server. 請參閱 < CLR 預存程序 > SQL Server 2005 線上叢書 》 中有關 CLR 預存程序和範例。See "CLR Stored Procedures" in SQL Server 2005 Books Online for more information on CLR stored procedures and examples. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在方法宣告化為預存程序的組件中。The following example shows a method declaration in an assembly that has been attributed as a stored procedure. 屬性設定為預存程序的名稱。The property has been set to the name of the stored procedure. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 組件中方法定義上的屬性，用於指出指定之方法應該在 SQL Server 中註冊為預存程序。

span.span: An attribute on a method definition in an assembly, used to indicate that the given method should be registered as a stored procedure in SQL Server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 的名稱。

span.span: The name of the stored procedure.
A representing the name of the stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是選擇性的。The property is optional. 下列範例會指定預存程序使用名稱參考`sp_sqlName`。The following example specifies that the stored procedure is referenced using the name `sp_sqlName`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/InsertCurrency.cs#7)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/InsertCurrency.vb#7)]
